pilithura- lankawe godak perahara kalanurupiwa adawana wita wishala wenaskamwalata lakwa thibenawa.mahanuwara asala perahara kiyanne ape ananyathawa kiwwoth niwaradiyi.mama 2005 diyawadana nilame dhurayata pathwela masayak athulatha thamayi perahara kale.mama wasarin wasara perahare sampradayika lakshana yali mathu karannath, narthana shilpinge dakshathawan wardhanaya karannath katayuthu kala.riyalitikaranaye balapama nuwara peraharatath ella wenawa.shilpin kamathiyi aakarshanaya ganna noyek thada warna, sikwins wani dilisena dewal thamange andum walata ekathu kara ganna.mokada rupawahini riyaliti wadasatahanwala peni inna aya janatha aakarshanaya ganna mewage dewal pawichchi karana nisa peraharata ekwana kalakaruwan da eewa anukaranaya karanna pelambaenawa.mama dalada maligawe peraharata ekwana shilpinta hama wita ma upades denne sampradaya aaraksha kara ganna oona kiyalayi.siw maha dewala basnayaka nilamewaruth me sthawaraye sitimin thamayi perahara sanwidhanaya karanne.eeka mata shakthiyak.shilpinta me widihata andum andinna kiyala api monawath nokara hitiyoth wade wenne naha.

ape amma mata podi kaledi kiyala dila thiyenne kawawath papadamen maninna epa kiyala ya.eeth ithin ehema ba ya.dan kale papadamen podi posh gathiyak labagatha hakiya.posh gathiya wadi kara gannata samaharu papadam kali andithi,samaharu kota karapu papadam andithi,samaharu yata papadam udata andithi.ewita spayidar man ya.thawath samaharu papadam inen pahalata sitina se andithi,thawath aෑyo papadam kanapita gasa andithi.eeketh podi gathiyak thibe.dan kale nan wadi purama thiyenne importad papadam ya.me nisa lankiya papadam walata bade para wadi awasan ya.ehemauna ekath honda ya.naththan apita kalas yanna wenneth saramayi baniyamayi gahagenaya.ehema unoth ganu lamayinta wenne reddeyi hatteyi andinnata ya.
eeth apita me samajaya diha baluwama penne samahara minissu jiwath wenne hariyata ee aya kawadawath nathi wenne na wage.
